panels.description: The number of requests currently being handled by the server.
panels.title: Requests in flight

panels.description: Total requests handled in the selected time range.
panels.title: Total requests

panels.description: Rate of requests handled per second in the selected time range.
panels.title: Requests per second

panels.description: Median round-trip request duration for the selected time range.
panels.title: Median request duration

panels.description: Median time-to-first-byte response duration for the selected time range.
panels.title: Median response duration

panels.description: A number of middleware errors encountered while handling requests in the selected time range.
panels.title: Total middleware errors

panels.description: Median request (estimated) size in bytes in the selected time range. Includes body.
panels.title: Median request size

panels.description: Median returned response body size in bytes in the selected time range.
panels.title: Median response size

panels.description: Sum of the sizes of all received requests in the selected time range.
panels.title: Total requests size

panels.description: Sum of sizes of all response bodies in the selected time range.
panels.title: Total responses size

panels.description: Percentage of responses with 4xx status code in all responses.
panels.title: 4xx response percentage

panels.description: Percentage of responses with 4xx status code in all responses.
panels.title: 5xx response percentage
